ProjectGameVer3

Class Manticore

  • java.lang.Object
    • ProjectGameVer3.Role
      • ProjectGameVer3.Monster
        • ProjectGameVer3.Manticore

  • public class Manticore
extends Monster

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Manticore()
      Any Manticore initialized without any parameter will be a King Koopa with 35% dodge chance.
      Manticore(int attackPower, java.lang.String name, int maxHP)
      This initializes an Orc with name , Attack Power and max health points.
      Manticore(java.lang.String name)
      Any Manticore initialized with a name will be a Boss Monster with 55% dodge chance.
